title: shrIrAjita
sahitya:
shrIrAjita.  rAgA:  rEvagupti.  aTa tALA.


1:  shrIrAjita guru guruLina madhyadi saurabhya kusumadindoppuva shikeya
 caraNam 2    eLeya candrana pOluva phAla phalagati toLagi beLaguvaraLeleya vaikhariya
 caraNam 3    sarasijamellayridu jamaridumbi kariya nAgara rItiya prabhugaLa
 caraNam 4    mInAvatAravItakEnendu shrutigaLike mANada pOlvaravindada lOcanagaLa
 caraNam 5    campaka kOrakakrta mancuboTTina sompinandada nAsikada mUgutiya
 caraNam 6    mathananna darpaNa darpaNa keDisuva kadapugaLandada karmari patrikeya
 caraNam 7    kundagaLu pOluva danta pangtiya candadi taLa taLisuva nigguLagaLa
 caraNam 8    eLemAvina cigurandada adharadhi poLeva koLala mEle calipanguligaLa
 caraNam 9    shrIgandhadi kivigaLeseva prabhA tEja rAjipa kuNDalagaLa
 caraNam 10   balamuri shankhava pOluvagaLadalli baLasi kaTTida rakSeya mANikyagaLa
 caraNam 11   unnatavAda bhujagaLalliyoppuva svarNada bhuja kIrtigaLa
1 caraNam 2   shrngAravAdalateya pOlva tOLgaLa rangu rAjipa cinnada tAyitagaLa
1 caraNam 3   kamalahastadi beNNeyuNDeya musugida vimala mungai kankaNada raktiguNva
1 caraNam 4   indireya sthAna pIThavAda edeyandda ravikOTi dIpti kaustubhada
1 caraNam 5   hokkuLa kamala surabhige sAliTTidda sokku tumbigaLandida hArAvaLiya
1 caraNam 6   kSIrAbdhiya teregaLa pOlva trivaLiya sEritUguva kaNThamAleya siriya
1 caraNam 7   paDanaDuvinali shESanandadi pOluva beDagina hEmadoDyANada sobaga
1 caraNam 8   tOra nidambadi candadi baLasi dA rAjamAna kAntiya dAmadirava
1 caraNam 9   kadaLiya kambhava pOluva toDegaLa odagidda pItAmbarada munjeraga
20: vaTuvina paraDu leDeyaloppuva hEma kaTakangaLu balu khalakhala ravava
21: kenjugurandadi pAdada mEloppuva kanjadhvajAnkusha shubharEkhEgaLa
2 caraNam 2   indu bimbava pOluva caraNanakangaLa brndAra nAthana mukuTakAntigaLa
2 caraNam 3   I pariyali bAla lIleyendesediha gOpAla abhaktavatsalavAgi mereva
2 caraNam 4    shrI purandara viTTala ryana shrIpAda padumakke namO namO embe
